title: The courtyer of Count Baldessar Castilio diuided into foure bookes. Very necessary and profitable for yonge gentilmen and gentilwomen abiding in court, palaice or place, done into English by Thomas Hoby.
author: Castiglione, Baldassarre, conte, 1478-1529.
publicationStmtPublisher: By wyllyam Seres at the signe of the Hedghogge,
